content.question: Which of the following statements explains why the plaque demonstrates continuity with Benin tradition?

choices.label: It shows the oba charging into battle on a horse.
It depicts the oba in a composite view to suggest his many roles.
It is part of a series that document the history of the obas.
It is believed to be the first of the plaques that depicted an oba.

content.answer: It is part of a series that document the history of the obas.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
